start: You must have slept for days. You woke up and found yourself in a strange place. The wall in front of you says 'collect 3 eyeballs and you can leave'. You think it must be a prank but you decided to play along.

main room.description: You are at the entrance of a room that looks like someone's living room. There is a coffee table with a small box at the center of the room, there's also a chair in the corner. There's also some trash just laying around. This room is very dusty. It looks like there's a door leading to the west and the south.

small room.description: You are in the small room. It's so tiny that there's only space for one person to turn around. Not much going on here. Seems more space between rooms instead of a room. There's a door to the north, the south and the east as well.

red room.description: You are in a red room. The walls are violently red it's almost agitating. There are pillows laying around randomly. Feels like this used to be a bedroom but now the bed is gone. You can also see a sack leaning against the wall to your right.

blue room.description: You are in a blue room. It's very cozy and feels less disturbing than the other rooms. There's a chest under a table that seems pretty old. On the desk stands a bottle that says 'Empty'.

small box.detail: This is a very strange looking box and it seems to be easy to open.

chair.detail: Just a wooden chair. Nothing fancy.

pillows.detail: Looks like someone had a pillow fight here.

chest.detail: It's a very old treasure chest. You are probably in luck.
